title: Crusade card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{Flavour|The card depicts a winged soldier with a flaming sword, leading a vast army.}} The Crusade card performs the following depending on the power level. *Power Level 0: Casts [[Aura of Abjuration]] at 1/4 the [[spell power]] of the card. *Power Levels 1 & 2: Attempts to convert all non-[[unique]], non-magic immune monsters within the [[line of sight]] to the player's cause, then casts Abjuration as above. For each eligible monster in [[LOS]], if 1d([[spell power]]) > the monster's HD Ã—35, it will be temporarily [[Charm|charmed]]. Monsters that disgust the player's god are ineligible. ==History== Aura of Abjuration replaced [[Mass Abjuration]] in 0.14.
